DOC.brief_summary: The type anti-inflammatory medication use post selective laser trabeculoplasty ( SLT ) may impact intra-ocular pressure ( IOP ) lower effect SLT . This study evaluate IOP lower effect SLT follow topical administration one following : prednisolone 1 % , ketorolac 0.5 % artificial tear .
DOC.brief_title: Anti-inflammatory Therapy Following Selective Laser Trabeculoplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Patients choose undergo SLT glaucoma randomize receive one prednisolone 1 % , ketorolac 0.5 % artificial tear four time day 5 day follow administration laser treatment . The IOP measure various time point follow SLT : 1 hour , 2 day , 1 week , 1 month , 3 month , 6 month , 1 year .
DOC.criteria: primary open angle glaucoma , pseudo exfoliation glaucoma previous incisional glaucoma surgery
